title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 15, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 15, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the news of Nick Saban testing positive with Covid-19. How much will his absence be felt this weekend against Georgia? We're joined by ESPN College Football Analyst David Pollack and Titans' Running Back Derrick Henry. Plus, what do the New York Knicks need to do to get things moving in the right direction?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
